Package renderer

Class Ogl3Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • renderer.AbstRenderer
      • renderer.Ogl3Renderer
  • public class Ogl3Renderer
extends AbstRenderer
    OpenGL Renderer (LWJGL version) - only using OpenGL core functionality. This version is not using the deprecated fixed function API. The main difference to OglRenderer is the usage of shaders and the VBO buffering of mesh data. As Glut cannot be used, all geometric primitives (cube, sphere, etc.) are loaded as meshes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ursula Derichs
